messages.content: What is the current recommended DASI score cutoff indicating good functional capacity for proceeding with surgery without further testing?
DASI score >34 (equivalent to ≥4 METs)
How many days before surgery should SGLT2 inhibitors be discontinued according to current guidelines?
3-4 days before surgery
Which renal denervation systems are currently FDA-approved for treatment of inadequately controlled hypertension?
The Paradise (ultrasound) and Symplicity (radiofrequency) systems are FDA-approved
What is the current recommended duration in days for first-line H. pylori treatment regimens?
14 days
What prerequisite testing is required before prescribing clarithromycin or levofloxacin for H. pylori treatment?
Antibiotic susceptibility testing demonstrating sensitivity to the specific antibiotic
What is the current recommended approach for managing asymptomatic elevated blood pressure (≥180/110 mm Hg) in hospitalized patients without evidence of target-organ damage?
Avoid treatment in most situations, even with markedly elevated BP
What is the current recommendation regarding blood pressure medication adjustment at hospital discharge?
Maintain prehospitalization BP regimen without intensification at discharge
According to current Endocrine Society guidelines, what serum 25(OH)D level (in ng/mL) defines vitamin D deficiency?
The Endocrine Society no longer endorses specific 25(OH)D levels to define vitamin D deficiency
What is the current recommended frequency of anal cancer screening for adults living with HIV?
Annual screening
In what sequence should anal cancer screening tests be performed in PLHIV?
Laboratory tests first, followed by digital anorectal examination
In which clinical scenario is dynamic testing (ACTH stimulation) currently recommended for patients being tapered from chronic glucocorticoid therapy?
Dynamic testing is only recommended in cases where there is ongoing uncertainty about adrenal status despite clinical assessment and morning cortisol testing
What is the current minimum age requirement for COVID-19 vaccination in children with HIV according to the updated opportunistic infection guidelines?
≥6 months of age
What is the minimum recommended daily dose of folic acid supplementation for people with epilepsy of childbearing potential before and during pregnancy?
At least 0.4 mg daily
Which antiseizure medications are currently recommended as preferred options for people with epilepsy of childbearing potential?
Lamotrigine, levetiracetam, or oxcarbazepine
What is the minimum number of contact hours required for behavioral intervention programs to demonstrate net benefit in children with BMI ≥95th percentile?
26 contact hours
What is the current recommended antithrombotic therapy for patients with symptomatic PAD who are not at increased bleeding risk?
Low-dose rivaroxaban plus daily aspirin
Which diabetes medications are currently recommended to reduce major adverse cardiovascular events in patients with both PAD and type 2 diabetes?
GLP-1 agonists and SGLT-2 inhibitors
According to current guidelines, who should make the final decision about an athlete's return to play following an arrhythmic event?
The decision should be made through shared decision-making between the physician and athlete.
What is the currently recommended age range for initial baseline PSA screening in Black men?
Between ages 40 and 45
At what age should PSA screening begin for Black men with a family history of prostate cancer?
Age 40
At what age should healthcare providers initiate discussions about stopping PSA screening in Black men?
After age 70
What is the current guideline recommendation regarding exercise for patients with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (HCM)?
Exercise is recommended to maintain fitness and reduce metabolic syndrome risk
Which cardiac myosin inhibitor is currently FDA-approved for the treatment of obstructive symptomatic HCM?
Mavacamten (approved April 2022)
What is the current USPSTF-recommended screening mammography interval for average-risk women aged 40-49 years?
Biennial (every 2 years)
What is the current USPSTF-recommended age range for routine biennial breast cancer screening in average-risk women?
40-74 years
What is the current recommended initial fluid resuscitation protocol for acute pancreatitis in terms of bolus volume (in mL/kg) and subsequent hourly infusion rate (in mL/kg/hour)?
10 mL/kg bolus followed by 1.5 mL/kg/hour infusion
What is the current recommended initial diet type and timing for patients with mild acute pancreatitis?
Low-fat solid diet within 24-48 hours
What are the current eligibility criteria for initiating LA CAB/RPV in non-virologically suppressed patients with HIV? List all required criteria.

All of the following criteria must be met:
1. Inability to take oral ART consistently despite optimal clinical support
2. High risk for HIV disease progression (CD4 <200 cells/µL or history of AIDS-defining illness)
3. No known resistance mutations to CAB or RPV
4. Access to intensive clinical follow-up and case management

After how many episodes of C. difficile infection is FMT now conditionally recommended in immunocompetent and mildly/moderately immunocompromised adults who have completed standard antibiotic therapy?
After the second recurrence (third episode)
According to current SCCM guidelines, is a physician required to be part of the hospital Rapid Response Team (RRT)?
No, a physician is not required to be part of the RRT
According to current guidelines, what is the appropriate response to persistent cryptococcal antigen in blood or CSF in a clinically stable patient on appropriate antifungal therapy?
Continue current antifungal regimen without escalation
What is the currently recommended screening tool for PTSD in primary care, and what is its optimal cutoff score range?
PC-PTSD-5 with a cutoff score of 3-4
What is the current first-line treatment recommendation for PTSD?
Psychotherapy is recommended over pharmacotherapy as first-line treatment
What are the current recommended oral anticoagulation options for maintenance therapy in cerebral venous thrombosis after initial parenteral heparin?
Either vitamin K antagonists or direct oral anticoagulants (DOACs)
What are the current recommended MRI sequences for diagnosing cortical vein thrombosis?
Contrast-enhanced MRV, gradient echo, and susceptibility-weighted sequences
What is/are the currently recommended pneumococcal conjugate vaccine(s) for routine use in children?
PCV15 and PCV20 (15-valent and 20-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccines)
What precautions are currently required when administering influenza vaccine to patients with severe egg allergies?
No special considerations are required; any appropriate influenza vaccine can be administered
What is the current recommended type of EEG monitoring for post-cardiac arrest patients who cannot follow commands?
Spot EEG monitoring is acceptable
According to current AHA guidelines, what is the recommendation regarding routine calcium administration during cardiac arrest?
Routine administration is not recommended except in specific circumstances (hyperkalemia or calcium-channel blocker overdose)
What is the current status of bictegravir/FTC/TAF for initial HIV therapy during pregnancy?
Alternative option for initial therapy
What is the current status of protease inhibitors for initial HIV therapy during pregnancy in patients without prior exposure to long-acting injectable cabotegravir?
No longer preferred
Is egg allergy a contraindication for egg-based influenza vaccine administration?
No, egg allergy is not a contraindication for any influenza vaccine preparations
What is the current indication for adult polio vaccination with inactivated polio vaccine (IPV)?
All adults with known or suspected suboptimal immunity, regardless of exposure risk
What is the current preferred vasoactive drug for treating hepatorenal syndrome (HRS) according to the 2024 AGA guidelines?
Terlipressin is the preferred vasoactive drug
What are the absolute contraindications for Terlipressin use in patients with hepatorenal syndrome according to current guidelines?
Hypoxemia and ongoing coronary, peripheral, or mesenteric ischemia
What is the maximum recommended duration for neuromuscular blockade in severe ARDS patients?
48 hours
What is the current recommendation regarding the use of recruitment maneuvers in ARDS patients?
Strongly discouraged
What is the current recommendation class (I, IIa, IIb, or III) for catheter ablation as first-line therapy in atrial fibrillation before trying antiarrhythmic drugs?
Class I
What is the current recommendation class for left atrial appendage occlusion devices in patients with contraindications to anticoagulation?
Class 2A
What is the current recommended pneumococcal vaccination schedule for vaccine-naive adults aged ≥65 years?
Either PCV20 alone or PCV15 followed by PPSV23 given ≥1 year later
What is the current recommended pneumococcal vaccination for adults aged 19-64 with underlying conditions who have previously received one dose of PPSV23?
Either PCV15 or PCV20 at least 1 year after their PPSV23 vaccination
What is the minimum required body temperature (in degrees Celsius) before proceeding with brain death/death by neurologic criteria (BD/DNC) testing?
What are the minimum required blood pressure values (in mmHg) before proceeding with brain death/death by neurologic criteria (BD/DNC) testing in adults?
Systolic blood pressure ≥100 mmHg AND mean arterial pressure ≥75 mmHg
According to current guidelines, should total joint arthroplasty be delayed based on a specific BMI threshold?
No, TJA should not be delayed based on BMI alone when other criteria for surgery are met
What is the recommended initial screening test and timing for infants with perinatal exposure to HCV?
Nucleic acid test (NAT) at age 2-6 months
For which geographic regions does the 2023 IWGDF/IDSA guideline specifically recommend empiric coverage of Pseudomonas aeruginosa in diabetic foot infections?
Asia and North Africa
What is the recommended standard duration range (in weeks) for antibiotic treatment of diabetic foot infections involving only skin and soft tissue according to the 2023 IWGDF/IDSA guidelines?
1-2 weeks
What is the current recommendation regarding preoxygenation before pediatric procedural sedation, and what is its grade of evidence?
Recommendation against preoxygenation (Grade 2C)
What is the current first-line recommended pneumococcal vaccine for immunocompetent adults who have not received prior pneumococcal vaccination?
PCV21
Which pneumococcal vaccine is currently recommended for residents of the Navajo nation who have not received prior pneumococcal vaccination?
PCV20 (or PCV15 followed by PPSV23 if PCV20 is unavailable)
What is the current recommendation for MRA use in HFpEF patients with NYHA class II-III symptoms who are on optimal therapy with a diuretic and SGLT2 inhibitor?
Addition of MRA therapy is recommended if patients have low hyperkalemia risk and intact kidney function
Which SARS-CoV-2 variant is targeted by the 2024-2025 Moderna and Pfizer COVID-19 vaccines?
KP.2 variant
What is the current recommended prophylactic antibiotic regimen for preventing ventilator-associated pneumonia in newly intubated moderate-to-severe TBI patients?
Single dose of ceftriaxone 2g IV within 12 hours of intubation
What is the currently recommended suture width and interval (in mm) for continuous closure of midline laparotomy incisions in patients with BMI ≤30 kg/m2?
5 mm width and interval
What is the currently recommended surgical approach for stage IB1 cervical cancer with stromal invasion less than 10 mm on excisional specimen?
Simple hysterectomy plus lymphadenectomy
What is the current age threshold for routine RSV vaccination recommendation in adults without comorbidities?
≥75 years
What is the minimum age for which Arexvy (RSV vaccine) is currently approved in high-risk patients?
50 years
What is the current recommended dose and timing of doxycycline post-exposure prophylaxis for STI prevention in high-risk individuals?
200 mg doxycycline within 72 hours of condomless sexual exposure
What is the current recommended consolidation therapy for patients with unresectable limited-stage SCLC who have not progressed after concurrent chemoradiation (include recommendation grade)?
Durvalumab for two years or until progression (Grade 1B recommendation)

What is the median overall survival benefit (in months) with durvalumab consolidation therapy compared to placebo in limited-stage SCLC patients who have not progressed after concurrent chemoradiation?
56 months with durvalumab versus 33 months with placebo (23-month improvement)
What are the current recommended first-line reversal options for direct factor Xa inhibitor-associated intracerebral hemorrhage?
Either andexanet alfa or 4-factor PCC, with selection individualized based on hemorrhage severity, local protocols, and availability
What is the current FDA approval status of pivmecillinam for acute simple cystitis in adult females in the United States?
FDA-approved as of 2024
What is the current recommended dosing regimen for pivmecillinam in the treatment of acute simple cystitis in the United States?
185 mg pivmecillinam base (200 mg pivmecillinam hydrochloride) orally three times daily for 3-7 days
What is the current minimum diagnostic threshold for total serum IgE (in IU/mL) for ABPA according to 2024 ISHAM criteria?
≥500 IU/mL
What is the current preferred testing method for detecting sensitivity to Aspergillus antigens according to 2024 ISHAM criteria?
Aspergillus IgG levels by enzyme immunoassay or lateral flow assay
What are the current minimum age and weight requirements for pemivibart use in pre-exposure prophylaxis of COVID-19?
Age ≥12 years and weight ≥40 kg
What are the currently recommended first-line pharmacologic agents for chronic weight management in eligible overweight or obese adults?
Tirzepatide or semaglutide are suggested as preferred agents
What is the expected range of mean body weight loss percentage with tirzepatide 15 mg weekly in adults with obesity?
15-21 percent body weight loss
What is the current recommendation regarding thyroid hormone administration in hemodynamically unstable, brain-dead organ donors, and what is its grade of evidence?
Thyroid hormone administration is not recommended (Grade 2C recommendation against use)
What is the current minimum total serum IgE level (in IU/mL) required for diagnosing allergic bronchopulmonary aspergillosis (ABPA)?
≥500 IU/mL
What is the current preferred laboratory test for detecting Aspergillus sensitivity in the diagnosis of ABPA?
Aspergillus IgG levels by enzyme immunoassay or lateral flow assay
What is the current first-attempt success rate for tracheal intubation using a hyperangulated videolaryngoscope blade in predicted difficult airways?
97% with hyperangulated blade
What is the currently recommended type of intravenous fluid for administration during kidney transplantation?
Balanced crystalloid solution
In patients with HFpEF who have persistent NYHA class II-III symptoms despite treatment with a diuretic and SGLT2 inhibitor, what is the current recommended next medication class to add to therapy?
Mineralocorticoid receptor antagonist (MRA)
In patients with stable ASCVD who require anticoagulation for a concurrent condition, what is the current recommendation regarding aspirin therapy?
Do not routinely add aspirin to anticoagulation
Which systemic psoriasis medications must be interrupted when administering live vaccines?
All systemic psoriasis medications except apremilast and acitretin
What is the first-line treatment recommendation for acute urticaria?
Nonsedating second-generation antihistamines alone
What is the current age threshold for routine RSV vaccination recommendation in adults without comorbidities?
75 years
What is the currently preferred pneumococcal vaccine for most adults requiring vaccination who are not at increased risk for serotype 4 infection?
PCV21
What type of videolaryngoscope blade is currently recommended as first-line for patients with predicted difficult airways?
Hyperangulated blade
What is the current recommendation regarding preoxygenation before pediatric procedural sedation?
Preoxygenation is not recommended
What is the current maximum recommended interval between aflibercept doses for maintenance therapy of diabetic macular edema?
16 weeks (using 8 mg dose)
What is the minimum blood glucose level required to diagnose DKA in a patient taking an SGLT2 inhibitor?
No minimum glucose requirement; can be diagnosed with normal or mildly elevated glucose (<200 mg/dL)
What is the currently recommended minimum daily maintenance dose of buprenorphine to achieve optimal reduction in overdose mortality during the first 30 days of treatment for opioid use disorder?
8-16 mg/day
What are the current recommended options for pneumococcal vaccination in adults?
PCV21 alone, PCV20 alone, or PCV15 followed by PPSV23
What is the currently recommended daily protein intake range (in g/kg/day) for most critically ill adult patients receiving nutrition support?
1.0-1.5 g/kg/day
What is the current age threshold for routine RSV vaccination recommendation in adults without comorbidities?
≥75 years
What is the current first-line pneumococcal vaccine recommendation for most adults requiring vaccination?
PCV21 alone
What is the current recommended consolidation therapy for standard-risk Ph-negative ALL patients in complete remission?
Blinatumomab-containing chemoimmunotherapy
What is the current recommended tyrosine kinase inhibitor for induction therapy in Ph+ ALL?
Ponatinib 30 mg daily or a second-generation TKI
What is the maximum recommended first-day methadone dose for rapid initiation protocol in hospitalized patients with OUD?
Up to 60mg on day 1
What is the current recommended prophylactic antibiotic dosing for ventilated TBI patients to prevent VAP?
Ceftriaxone 2g IV once within 12 hours of intubation
What is the current age threshold for routine RSV vaccination recommendation in adults without comorbidities?
75 years
What is the current first-line pneumococcal vaccine recommendation for most adults requiring vaccination?
PCV21
What is the current blood pressure threshold (in mmHg) for initiating antihypertensive therapy in a patient at high cardiovascular risk according to the 2024 ESC guidelines?
What is the current recommended placement of CGRP antagonists in the treatment algorithm for migraine prevention?
First-line therapy option
What is the current recommended approach for selecting between andexanet alfa and PCC for factor Xa inhibitor reversal in acute ICH?
Individualize selection based on patient factors
At what gestational age is RhD testing and prophylaxis now recommended to begin for pregnancy loss or termination?
≥12 0/7 weeks gestation
Which HPV subtypes have been newly recognized as potentially oncogenic in cervical cancer according to the 2024 systematic review?
Types 26 and 73 are now included
What is the current recommended duration of durvalumab consolidation therapy for patients with limited-stage SCLC who have not progressed after concurrent chemoradiation?
Two years of durvalumab
What is the current recommended therapy for patients with unresectable stage III EGFR-mutant NSCLC (exon 19 deletion or L858R mutation) who have completed chemoradiation without disease progression?
Osimertinib therapy
What is the current recommendation regarding the use of wakefulness agents (such as methylphenidate) for cancer-related fatigue in adult cancer patients?
Wakefulness agents should be avoided, except in select populations such as those with opioid-related fatigue
What is the minimum recommended daily duration of long-term oxygen therapy (in hours) for patients with severe hypoxemia to achieve mortality benefit?
15 hours per day
At what age should pediatricians begin encouraging shared caregiver-child reading according to current AAP guidelines?
At birth
Which Hib-containing vaccines are currently preferred for American Indian/Alaska Native infants?
Both monovalent PRP-OMP Hib vaccine and hexavalent DTaP-IPV-Hib-HepB vaccine
What is the currently recommended first-line pneumococcal vaccine for most adults requiring vaccination who are not at increased risk for serotype 4 infection?
PCV21
For which age group is RSV vaccination now specifically recommended without requiring additional risk factors?
≥75 years
What is the recommended minimum daily maintenance dose of buprenorphine to achieve optimal reduction in overdose mortality during the first 30 days of treatment for opioid use disorder?
>16 mg/day
What is the maximum recommended first-day methadone dose for rapid initiation protocol in hospitalized patients with opioid use disorder?
60 mg
What is the current minimum total serum IgE level (in IU/mL) required for diagnosis of allergic bronchopulmonary aspergillosis (ABPA)?
≥500 IU/mL
What is the minimum daily duration (in hours) of supplemental oxygen therapy recommended for patients with severe hypoxemia to achieve mortality benefit?
15 hours
What is the current recommended tofacitinib dose for patients with RA who have VTE risk factors?
5mg twice daily may be appropriate even in patients with VTE risk factors
What is the maximum recommended daily oral prednisone dose after pulse glucocorticoids in lupus nephritis?
40 mg/day
What is the current minimum age for pitolisant use in narcolepsy patients in the United States?
6 years
What is the current maximum number of positive sentinel lymph nodes allowed to omit completion axillary lymph node dissection in T1-T3 breast cancer patients who will receive radiation therapy?
Two positive nodes (fewer than three)
